alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Palo Pinto; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 4:00AM CDT until March 24 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN EASTLAND...SOUTHEASTERN STEPHENS AND SOUTHWESTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 359 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Necessity, or 7 miles north of Ranger, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastland, Ranger, Gordon, Lake Daniel, Necessity, Gunsight, Caddo, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Strawn, Mingus, Harpersville and Morton Valley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
